content.label: Fantastic adaptation of a great board game, and the campaign is a fun addition.

I am a board gamer. I love tile-laying games like Carcassonne. There are very few games which capture the essence of the board game perfectly in a digital version. Galaxy trucker does this amazingly well. Best part - does not require internet and has a very small data footprint!

An excellent presentation of an excellent tabletop game. Had to knock off one star for the super-strict building rules, and a few more unlockables to spend those hard-earned credits on would make a good game even better

title.label: Not normally a space puzzle fan, but...

content.label: I love this game! I've never played the board game so I can't compare, but the app is very smoothly designed. Much easier to manage the screen on an iPad but phone is still doable. Excellent interface, clever take on resource management. A real surprise and worth the cost.
I'm going to need to pick up the game. I laugh every time something blows up on my ship. Very fun game.

I'm an avid board gamer, but I've been played this. I'm pretty excited to now. 

My only complaint is I don't see why I'm not protected from certain shots or meteors. I just started playing today, but sometimes I have lasers, shields, and batteries and still can't avoid getting hit.
Very fun! Campaign has a few head scratchers tho.
Great idea. Great campaign. Great interface.
Hours and hours of good campaign!  Really fun game, captures the board game perfectly!  Love it!
I loved the board game and love this game as well. It is a must have for any board game geek. 😊😎❤️

title.label: Not just a great board game adaptation

content.label: This is a great game period
Honestly, if you love the board game this is just as fun. The campaign on it is pretty neat too it really adds a cool little feature.
If you like the board game, the app captures the spirit really well.
The game is incredibly well designed and complex.

title.label: Really excellent translation of the board game

content.label: Campaign mode is great, and the game is very fun and challenging.

I made the mistake of purchasing on iPhone, but was planning to play on iPad. Insanely this game is not universal and apparently I need to repurchase to play on my iPad. Obviously I am not going to do that and have wasted $5.
Having to purchase for iPad and again for phone was disappointing. Especially the Alien Tech expansion.

title.label: Super fun! New twists on the original board game

content.label: They totally mastered the usage of the board game's mechanics in this app form. Moreover, they designed a whole new turn-based system that's equally as fun. Also, the campaign mode retains the same humor and is the funniest 1-player app I've downloaded onto my phone. Cheers!
No glitches, almost a good as the board game.
Loved the game as its a very intuitive adaptation of the board game. Last update causes it to crash within 30 seconds, and it no longer works:(
Please lower the volume and frequency of the shop guy tapping on the glass. Or eliminate it completely and find some other way to get people to check out the shop. It's immensely annoying.

I love the board game and jumped right into the iOS version. Campaign is fun, and online play is great. However, the app crashes pretty regularly. There has been a time or two where an online game does something wrong such that my phone says I'm in second, but my opponent's phone shows that they are in second. Then when a decision card come up the game basically freezes because we are both waiting for the other to make a decision that were not being told to make. 

Also a little annoyed that I had to buy the pocket version for my phone and the full version for my iPad. That is preventing me from getting the expansion, as I don't want to pay for it twice.
This is a great implementation of the board game of the same name. It is even a great way to learn the mechanics of the game.
Great game!!!!
Fun
Fun! Awesome game to kill time!

title.label: Great implementation of game with added campaign fun

content.label: Campaign adds alot of extra fun to an already fun and crazy game.
Love the board game and the app lives up to the game
Lots of humor, fun little quests, and it's great imagining flying a shambling pile of sewer pipes collapsing as you rocket across the galaxy.
One of the better boardgame to mobile ports I've tried.
Galaxy trucker is the best board game app on the app store, even surpassing Agricola. They went above and beyond with the single player campaign. The game was just updated with a new expansion too!
Yay an app for a great game! Beats monopoly hands down.

title.label: Great for new players and old

content.label: A perfect recreation of the original game that takes away all the frustration of set-up and management. Plus it adds solo campaigns for even more enjoyment!
Boardgame with a campaign! I like this much better than table top version 👍👍
Excellent
They've really managed to keep the feel of a board game while fully employing the platform of mobile devices. It's worth every penny and I really hate paying for apps.
A great game based on a board game. I wish the graphics could move faster, since I care more about the game play than watching the events happen.
The game is fun and easy to learn. I like that you can play on your own of with other people!
Galaxy Trucker is amazing! This is the best transition from board game to iOS game I've ever seen!
Enjoying this game a lot. Well worth the price.
Based on board game
I barely review anything but this is too good. A great implementation of the board game. One of my 2 favorite all time mobile games.
Great game, very good app.
I love Galaxy Trucker and this is a great mobile version.
Love it, app is good, game is great
Almost as fun as the board game, and with all of the shenanigans.

title.label: My favorite board game is an app!

content.label: Awesome job! Love the campaign mode and looking forward to the expansion additions.
After ya realize the game is mostly building your ship to meet or excel at challenges, it's the perfect puzzle game with stakes!
Amazing game. Hundreds of hours of entertainment. Makes you laugh. Easily the best game I've bought on the App Store!

title.label: Best of board games on iOS

content.label:
This app is right up there with Carcassonne as one of the all time best iOS versions of a popular hobby board game. Truly amazing implementation!

Thanks for cleaning up the only  fault this app had. Now this trucker can listen to all his jams while playing the game!
